Windlord/Talon/Perceptor:::

Windlord sighed again and mount up, he didnt l=
iked to be rude but it was better than be comsumed by rage.

**************=
***********************

Talon smiled and she walked towards the medic bay,=
 waitting Tucson to come back to CR.

*************************************=
***

Perceptor opned his comlink in Maximal frecuency to Rodimus and the ot=
hers maximals and said =E2=80=9CHey, any one there? =E2=80=9D


From: Sandy=
 Panico 
Sent: Tuesday, July 05, 2011 7:33 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
S=
ubject: Re: Changing times (Cue: All Maximals & Autobots)




Quickstride k=
new his friend needed someone with him who could offer moral support.  He t=
akes a seat with Windlord and looks to him in a friendly manner.

" I know =
something that might help get your mind off things for a while.  Things hav=
e settled down for a little while so I think it's okay if we venture out fo=
r a bit .  There's a place I found one day while grazing outside, and I nev=
er saw anything as extraordinary as what I saw when I walked in.  "

He get=
s back into beast mode and offers his back to Windlord.

" mount up, I'll t=
ake you there right now.  Trust me, it's so worth the ride out there.  And =
I'm not gonna spoil the surprise."

In the room, Tucson gives Talon a genti=
le smile and a loving arm around her shoulder.  Gone is the sign of bad tem=
perament as he focuses his attention on her.  A tiny air of friskiness come=
s over him as he gently pulls Talon into his embrace.

" You're absolutely =
right, Talon.  It's a shame the CR chambers aren't designed to fit two indi=
viduals together.  Which reminds me..  I still owe you something don't I?"
=

His mind was clearly on something else now as a playful look comes over hi=
s faceplate.  If anyone could bring him out of a bad mood, it was Talon.  N=
ow somewhat cured of his temper he now remembers something else of great im=
portance.  He still had to meet with Wheelie.  But now that he was in a bet=
ter mood, he could converse with him in a more sane manner.

" Ah, I forgot=
, I have to meet with Wheelie first.  I asked Uproar to escort him to my qu=
arters but, I'm sure Wheelie had other ideas.  I better go rescue Uproar fr=
om extreme exhaustion, no doubt Wheelie is wearing him out somewhere in the=
 base."

He gives Talon a kiss on her cheek and a last minute hug.

" I won=
't take long I promise.  Then it's to the CR chamber."

He then turns to he=
ad towards his quarters.  From a far he can hear Uproar choking on a rather=
 large hairball and he's quick to follow the sound.

" Uproar, are you alri=
ght?"

Uproar gags but manages to say something.

" Hairball.  Need help ge=
tting it out."

Tucson cocks his head.

" hmm?  What exactly is a hairball?=
"

Uproar looks to him in desperation.

"please just help me okay?!"

Tucso=
n nods.

"What do you  need?"

Uproar looks up.

" Whack me on the back rea=
l hard. That usually gets the hairballs out"

Tucson hesitates for a moment=
 and then with a firm but careful slap on Uproar's back, the hairball gets =
expelled.  A look of relief floods the cat's face.

"ah, much better. Thank=
s Sir, I needed that."

Tucson smiles and tries to listen for wheelie.

" I=
 take it Wheelie took off on you.  Don't worry, my fault for not warning yo=
u about him.  All right, I'll go find him."

He leaves Uproar who now heave=
s a large sigh of relief.



Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 
=

On Jul 5, 2011, at 3:22 AM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wr=
ote:


    
  Windlord/Talon:

  Windlord sighed and sit down in a corder.
=

  *******************************

  Talon walked towards Tucson and she c=
arfully set one of her hands in his shoulder, trying to not hurt him =E2=80=
=9CYou should come back to Cr, you need it=E2=80=9D.

  From: Sandy Panico =

  Sent: Monday, July 04, 2011 9:42 PM
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Subj=
ect: Re: Changing times (Cue: All Maximals & Autobots)




  Quickstride gi=
ves Windlord a soft pat on the back in sympathy.  He realizes the stress th=
at Hydras had put on everyone, including those most effected by the shell p=
rogram.

  "what hydras did to you and the others was unspeakable.  But loo=
k, there is a bright side, if it weren't for Tucson none of us would have e=
ver seen any of you again.  And for the first time in a long time, we're fi=
nally giving Hydras what he deserves.  So yeah what Hydras did was really b=
ad but, Tucson isn't abou to let him get away with it.  And to think he wan=
ts another one on one with Hydras.  I saw a huge dent on his shoulder, look=
ed like something that hasn't quite healed yet..  I don't think he's taking=
 the proper time in the CR chamber."

  Inside the room, Tucson begins to s=
how signs of fatigue and puts his hand over his forehead.  He knew he wasn'=
t taking the proper time to repair and recharge properly, due to the fact t=
hat he was assisting others before helping himself.  

  He turns his head =
to Leo Prime.

  " Nemesis...  Leo Prime, the ship, it could be Decepticon =
property.,,   I vote we remain cautious at all times." 



  Perpetually on=
 the move and constantly busy. 

  On Jul 4, 2011, at 10:04 PM, Airshadow N=
ightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:


      
    Windlord:

    Windlor=
d sighed and shooked his head in disbelief.

    From: Sandy Panico 
    Se=
nt: Sunday, July 03, 2011 9:24 PM
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Subje=
ct: Re: Changing times (Cue: All Maximals & Autobots)




    Quickstride g=
ives a sheepish smile to Windlord.

    " Same here but, visualizing some p=
lace peaceful isn't so hard.  I'd have to imagine that for you, being sky b=
ound is sort of your sanctuary.  For me it's a quiet, open meadow teaming w=
ith sweet patches of green grass, eating to my spark's content.  So much so=
 that I can actually smell it.  Just think of the scent of clean air and ho=
w the pockets of wind playfully carry you in their path.   Free as a bird, =
just give it a whirl."

    Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

=
    On Jul 3, 2011, at 9:57 PM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...>=
 wrote:


        
      Windlord:

      =E2=80=9CMeditation isnt my best =
skill=E2=80=9Dsaid Windlord

      From: Sandy Panico 
      Sent: Friday, =
July 01, 2011 4:26 PM
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Subject: Re: =
Changing times (Cue: All Maximals & Autobots)




      Quickstride looks t=
o both Windlord and Rodimus and then heaves a sigh. He knew of one individu=
al who could have possibly helped everyone in this situation.  One that cou=
ld teach everyone how to clear their minds.  The same mech who also trained=
 Prowl, Tucson, Straight Shot and Nightshift.  

      "Master Yokitron wou=
ld definitely have been a big help ta all of us.  He often trained distress=
ed warriors as yourselves how ta clear one's mind to purge it of impure tho=
ughts that may overcome them.  He did that through meditation.  Surrounding=
 one's soul with a peaceful environment where one could find inner peace.  =
That's what everyone needs, inner peace."

      He smiles to Rodimus, Wind=
lord and Lord Elder, who he just happens to notice.  

      " Ah, Lord Eld=
er, please join us.  I was just telling these guys about Master Yokitron an=
d how he used ta help troubled mechs through meditation.  I think we could =
all use a little bit of that, huh?"

      Perpetually on the move and cons=
tantly busy. 

      On Jul 1, 2011, at 2:00 PM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly=
2002@...> wrote:


          
        Windlord:

        Windlord l=
ooked at Rodimus and Quickstride and said =E2=80=9CIt=E2=80=99s consuming m=
e, and i dont like to become what Hydras attemped to do with us... I dont k=
now what to do to make it stop... I need help but I dont know at whom ask i=
t, my only purpose now is retribution but I dont like that it consume what =
remains of my old self=E2=80=9D

        From: Sandy Panico 
        Sent: =
Friday, July 01, 2011 12:05 PM
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        =
Subject: Re: Changing times (Cue: All Maximals & Autobots)




        Quic=
kstride puts a friendly arm around Windlord with a gentile look on his face=
.

        " I definitely know how ya feel.  There's times when it was okay=
 ta smash someone's snout in with a good, swift kick of my hind hooves, but=
 not now.  But things have a way of working out on their own.  Some call it=
 karma.  What they do ta others, eventually comes back ta them.  And all we=
 need ta do is sit back and let that happen.  Hydras is gonna get it big ti=
me.  I see it in Tucson Prime's face.  He means business and he won't give =
up till that miserable lizard is dealt with accordingly.  "

        Perpet=
ually on the move and constantly busy. 

        On Jul 1, 2011, at 2:26 AM=
, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:


            
       =
   Windlord:

          =E2=80=9CI=E2=80=99m Really mad at Predacons what t=
hey have done us...  And mad at myself for all the  troubles that I tried t=
o create for Rodimus and Nighlight, But the worse of all is... I ENJOYED  T=
O DO ALL THAT CHAOS!! =E2=80=9Dsaid Windlord almost with despair =E2=80=9CT=
he sensasion to act without balance and restain was... overhelming... And n=
ow it=E2=80=99s hard to for me to keep it in check...  But I want to do som=
ething usefull with my rage and give the Preds a payback=E2=80=9D


       =
   From: Sandy Panico 
          Sent: Thursday, June 30, 2011 5:53 PM
    =
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Subject: Re: Changing times (Cu=
e: All Maximals & Autobots)




          Quickstride sighs, transforms and=
 puts a hand on his shoulder.

          " It's okay ta be frustrated.  Thi=
ngs are really nuts around here and tensions are at an all time high.  Even=
 I'm gett'n effected by stress.  Well.. Put it this way, better ta have som=
e ventilation when I'm around these days.  Any way, if something bothers ya=
 it's better ta talk about it than keeping it inside.  Besides I got all da=
y."

          Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

          On =
Jun 30, 2011, at 4:56 PM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote=
:


              
            Windlord:

            "No"sighed the male w=
hile he looked at Quickstride "I'm not"

            -----Original Message-=

            Sent: Thursday, June 30,=
 2011 11:02 AM

Re: Changing times (Cue: All Maximals & Autobots)

            > <OLD>
    =
        >
            > Windlord headed towards the MEdic bay and for a whi=
le watched without been
            > seen Nightligh and her daughter spent=
 time together and after few minutes 
            > he
            > headed=
 towards the the training room.

            <NEW>

            LORD ELDER =
stood in the doorway of the training room for a moment
            watching=
 WINDLORD, his optics dark and thoughtful, as if wondering
            what=
 was going on in the mind of this maximal. There were dark corners
        =
    to him, and he was not sure what it portended to.

            > <OLD>
=
            >
            > With permission granted, Quickstride transforms=
 into beast mode and trots
            > off to find Windlord. He trots by =
the med bay then perks his ears up,
            > following the source of W=
indlord's footsteps until he clip clops into the
            > training roo=
m.
            >
            > "Windlord, are you okay?"

            <NEW>=


            Sliding out of the way for a moment he watched as QUICKSTRIDE=

            interacted with WINDLORD, looking for cues and clues that woul=
d help
            him to understand him. Perhaps it would be revealed in t=
heir
            conversation.

            (TAG)

            Preston

nks
